meanings.definition: Thromboxanes: A group of lipid compounds derived from arachidonic acid that play a role in blood clotting and vasoconstriction.
meanings.sent1: The thromboxanes help in blood clotting after an injury.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study thromboxanes to understand how blood clots form.
meanings.sent3: The thromboxanes decided to throw a clotting party in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: In the body's drama, thromboxanes are the actors that control clotting scenes.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny thromboxanes working together to seal a wound like tiny construction workers.
